skillTree.localised_description: The unnatural speed and brutality of a reanimated Promethean makes it the ideal mount for any Undead, battle-mongering pirate.
"It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"
You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: It's been a long, hard voyage to get to this point, but now trust and loyalty - so difficult to engender among freebooters - is firmly established between Lord and admiral.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!
"They'll never know the difference, even up close."

effects.description:
Income from all enemy buildings: -5%
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.localised_description: If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.
The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +8% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.
Strike hard, strike true.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.
"Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hand."
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The strength and agility of the Vampire comes from a place beyond: the supernatural realm of the Unliving.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.
Sheer, undiluted spite sharpens the dead eye further.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Spiteful Shot"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spiteful Shot Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spiteful Shot Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: No matter how far away, none can escape the Kiss of the Deep, nor breathe again with lungs full of seawater.
The tidal currents shall slow the foe's advance.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Tidecall Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: All manner of creatures infest the deep, many who have never - and should never - be seen above the waves.

ui_effects.localised_text: ➕ Summons a unit of Rotting Prometheans

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Denizens of the Deep"

skillTree.localised_description: As surely as night follows day, when the mist descends, death isn't far behind.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Fog of the Damned Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Fog of the Damned Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Fog of the Damned"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Fog of the Damned Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Fog of the Damned Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.
Once the mighty Kraken's tentacles take hold, only the toughest can fight their way free.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Kraken's Pull"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Kraken's Pull Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Kraken's Pull Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: No one sails this ship of fools.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Vangheist's Revenge"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Vangheist's Revenge Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Vangheist's Revenge Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
Bone, muscle and sinew cannot always be relied upon to hold together unassisted.

skillTree.localised_description: Death hasn't got in the way of this one's sure-shotted aim; in fact, if anything, he's got better.

skillTree.localised_description: You can't have too much of a good thing and a bit of what you fancy does no harm.

skillTree.localised_description: What has been seen cannot be unseen.

skillTree.localised_description: Like Unliving moths drawn inexorably towards a dazzling flame, the risen drowned strive - and stumble - to always be close to the one who has bound them.

Weapon strength: +6% for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units

skillTree.localised_description: "Listen very carefully, me hearties, I shall say this only once… Quiet! Stromfels' stinkin' breath!"
The once-men of the Undead legions march ever onwards, according to the will of their binder.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is a dirty business, that much is certain, so why not get a little extra help to give yourself an edge?

skillTree.localised_description: Their rope skills are really rather excellent, considering how long the entire crew have been dead.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Surviving death tends to instil a certain toughness in one.

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
They could not break free, even if they wanted to.
Cursed to haunt the waves forever, never finding rest or solace.
If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +7 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +10 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.
Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.
Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.
Beware those who sail under the black flag - they give no quarter and never, ever give up the chase.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Beautiful and innocent it may be, but all will be consumed by fire in the end. It is written.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from razing settlements and winning siege battles
Brute: Extra loyalty gained following a battle

backgroundSkills.localised_description: How else is an ordinary, decent pirate to make an honest living in these hard, dark times?

effects.description: Gain loyalty from sacking and raiding
Brute: Extra loyalty gained following a battle

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Killing is at the forefront of this one's mind. Hopefully, they also know how to run a ship.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from defeating enemy army and wounding/killing enemy Lords in battle
Brute: Extra loyalty gained following a battle

backgroundSkills.localised_description: It takes more than mere muscle to be leader, you must also know how to make money and how to inflict pain - a lot of pain.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from recruiting and fighting with other pirate Lords in battle
Mastermind: Loyalty decline rate is lowered

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: There's nothing quite like a good, straightforward plan - and this is nothing like one! Complexity rarely trumps simplicity, in all matters.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from ambush and lightning-strike battles
Mastermind: Loyalty decline rate is lowered

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Be the cargo powder, steel, gold or flesh, in the final analysis it matters not.

effects.description: Gain loyalty from constructing pirate coves
Mastermind: Loyalty decline rate is lowered
